title: Mike Judge from Judge/Youth Of Today
itunes:title: Mike Judge from Judge/Youth Of Today
description:
Episode 227 - Mike Judge. Do I need to say anything else? I sure hope not but in case you aren’t aware, he is the vocalist for legendary hardcore band Judge as well as spending some time with another seminal hardcore band, Youth of Today. Mike opens up to me about stepping away from hardcore, rumors and finding family. It’s a deeply personal look at a man who’s life was changed by many aspects of this scene we hold dear. br>Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
